content: अह {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} A particle implying({%a%}) praise (पूजा); ({%b%}) separation; ({%c%}) resolution, ascertainment, certainty; and translated by ‘surely,’ ‘certainly,’ ‘yes,’ ‘well’; ({%d%}) rejecting; ({%e%}) sending; ({%f%}) deviation from custom, impropriety; त्वमह ग्रामं गच्छ, त्वमह रथेतारण्यं गच्छ <ls>Sk.</ls>; स्वयमह रथेन याति 3 उपाध्यायं पदातिं गमयति <ls>Sk.</ls>
